__e: If they know stuff about people on my patch, people bringing stuff into this valley, I should damn well know about it.
I know that distracts you, but... it's not good for us.
You should come see the girls Take your mind off things
Well savour by looking elsewhere, you're putting me off.
Father, I hold the world in my grasp, and yet this girl distracts me.
Besides, missing someone is difficult... and far too distracting.
I thought if I did some work, it might take my mind off things.
Father, I hold the world in my grasp, and yet this girl distracts me.
You guys stay here and distract them.
Leave through the gate in right field. That'll draw them out of here.
What you're doing is not only distracting, it's dangerous.
Leave through the gate in right field. That'll draw them out of here.
Right now, she's the closest thing to that... and that is a terrible distraction... from the real light that has finally come for them.
You might say he runs things.
That'll only make his spotlight bigger, keeping it off us.
You two distract the little one, and I'll handle the bad man.
Would you please stop pacing? It's very distracting.
I'll show you around, it'll entertain me.
no, i try not to. i find it distracting.
The great bond between you and your son, his love for you, will distract him.
One of us can keep him occupied while the other gets to the old woman.
Because, yeah, he may have a little friend now and, yeah, he may be a little bit distracted but I tell you something, I'm still here and as long as I'm still here, you are going nowhere!
